explains: n. 匾牌，匾额，纪念匾；牙斑，齿菌斑；（医）斑（块）；动脉斑块；（微生物）空斑，噬斑；（用于赌博的扁平）筹码
wordGroup: dental plaque 牙菌斑；菌斑；牙垢
atheromatous plaque 粥样斑块；动脉粥样硬化斑块
senile plaque 老年斑；老人斑

sentences.en: The First Lady unveiled a commemorative plaque.
sentences.cn: 第一夫人为纪念牌匾揭了幕。

sentences.en: On one side of the main entrance there's a red plaque.
sentences.cn: 大门口的一侧有块红色匾牌。

sentences.en: Deposits of plaque build up between the tooth and the gum.
sentences.cn: 牙菌斑的沉积物在牙齿和牙龈间形成。
